DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that exercise training would improve the mechanoreflex and metaboreflex control in heart failure patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Exercise Training on Mechanoreflex and Metaboreflex Control in Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with systolic heart failure; New York Heart Association (NYHA) class IIIII; Left ventricular ejection fraction less than 40%; Peak Oxygen Consumption less than 20 ml/Kg/min; Stable Clinical Status. Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease; Neuromuscular Diseases; Orthopedic Diseases; Neurologic Diseases; Neoplastic Diseases; Recent myocardial infarction or cardiac surgery (less than 6 months); Unstable angina pectoris; Atrial Fibrillation; Pacemakers users; Changing medication or hospital admission.
